title: Maricopa County Recorder Has a Personal Clinton Connection?
subtitle: A rumor claiming that Maricopa County Recorder Helen Purcell has connections to the Clinton campaign through her late husband, Joe Purcell, is false.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Maricopa County Recorder Helen Purcell was married to Joe Purcell, a former Lieutenant Governor of Arkansas who served under Bill Clinton.
